summary: This is an email chain from November 2021 discussing whether to categorize information about Elizabeth Loftus. The forwarded external email questions why Elizabeth Loftus would have a seat at 'the table' given her association with Jeffrey Epstein and her board membership at EDGE, an organization Epstein was involved with.

persons.name: Angela Foster
persons.context: Sends an external email questioning Elizabeth Loftus's association with Jeffrey Epstein and her role on the EDGE board.

persons.name: Elizabeth Loftus
persons.context: Subject of the email; her association with Jeffrey Epstein and her board membership at EDGE are questioned.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as someone Elizabeth Loftus clearly knew, implying a problematic association.

connections.description: The email claims Elizabeth Loftus 'clearly knew Epstein and his ilk', suggesting a social or professional association.
Angela Foster is the sender of an email questioning and drawing attention to Elizabeth Loftus's associations.

events.title: Email questioning Elizabeth Loftus's associations
events.description: An external email from Angela Foster is forwarded internally, questioning why Elizabeth Loftus would have influence given her known association with Jeffrey Epstein and her position on the EDGE board.

keyFacts: An email from November 2021 questions the credibility and position of psychologist Elizabeth Loftus due to her association with Jeffrey Epstein.
Elizabeth Loftus was a board member of EDGE, an organization with which Jeffrey Epstein was involved.
The internal email discussion involves deciding how to categorize this information, specifically whether it is 'NTW for the defense'.
